Strings.Text: The door is locked. {pause}{clear}Only authorized personnel can \naccess the lock. {pause}{clear}It is impossible to unlock.{pause}
The First Commemoration \nMonument, Dr. Kirk. {pause}{clear}In comemmoration of the \nestablishment of the Third {pause}{clear}Energy Theory.{pause}
The Second Commemoration \nMonument, Republic of Bolzinia {pause}{clear}In comemmoration of the \ngovernment who changed clean {pause}{clear}energy to a weapon.{pause}
The Third Commemoration \nMonument, Spacetime Meteorite {pause}{clear}In comemmoration of the \nOverdrive, the end of the {pause}{clear}Cretaceous.{pause}
The Fourth Comemmoration \nMonument, Timegate {pause}{clear}In comemmoration of the \ntransformation from weapon to {pause}{clear}the Timegate.{pause}

The Fifth Comemmoration 
Monument, Paradise {pause}{clear}In comemmoration of 
establishment of the same {pause}{clear}enviroment as the late 
Cretaceous.{pause}
The Last Comemmoration \nMonument, Noah's Ark {pause}{clear}In comemmoration of the human \nrace who came to this world and {pause}{clear}created a “Paradise”.{pause}
The door is locked. {pause}{clear}Only authorized personnel can \naccess the lock. {pause}{clear}It is impossible to unlock.{pause}
